name: Super Brawl Showdown!
description:
Super Brawl is Back!

Super Brawl Showdown! is an unofficial fan-game created as an homage to the Super Brawl series; serving as a sequel to Super Brawl 2, while also including content from other installments in the series.  Many stages have been redrawn, and there are plenty of newcomers created with original sprites.

Relive the original 2D fighting game remastered and expanded upon!

Every single character featured in Super Brawl 1 and 2 has been included, each gaining many new moves designed to make them fun and unique. They all feel and control like the shows they represent, and there are plenty to choose from.

Enjoy the gameplay of the original Super Brawl 2 with expanded mechanics!

  • Dashing and Evading
  • Air Blocking (Some Characters)
  • Block Breaking and Regeneration
  • Fighter-Specific Passives
  • Artifacts System (Assist)

...and more!

Regular Updates

The game is still in Open-Beta. This means a lot of characters are unfinished, and some game modes have yet to be finished as well. The game will update regularly, adding more content such as stages, fighters, and story content.

Stay tuned to see the game fully realized!
